channel.title: RS Pure To Main Or Zerk
channel.description:
Hey I have been thinking over the few days whether to quit a pure and make it into a main or zerk with the new update coming I think being a pure is worthless as I will get 99 strength and be 102 combat :s
So which should I go for zerk or main, I don't have a main currently so it would be a good idea, But I can get easy XP to get 45 defence as I have done monkey madness and also can do dragon slayer with ease and few other quests which give defence XP.
Please help me make a decision.
Thanks, RS PS

item.title: RS Pure To Main Or Zerk
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

Nope im not a maxed pure but If I stay as pure I am obviously going to max out.

Read full topic
